game.name: Monster Foot Doctor
game.description:
Where are you, girls? Four of your favorite ghouls have recently met with an accident and got a serious injury on their foot. For this reason, they need an urgent medical assistance. You should know that their lovely Halloween costumes needed barefoot and these four cute girls met an injury while haunting the neighborhood. As a result, their feet got hurt badly. Are you ready to help them out? Join Monster Foot Doctor Game and get ready to show your doctor skills!

Make sure that you have collected your emergency kit before heading to Monster High. Begin this brand new doctor game for girls with selecting your very first patient. Once it is done, get ready to wash her foot under the foot caring routine. Hurry up, ladies! Your patient then needs the removal of the wooden twigs stuck in her foot. Do it for her with the help of a gentle touch of a pair of tweezers. Try to use disinfectant lotion, clean up the injured toenail as well as a bag of ice in order to help her overcome the redness in this free online doctor game.

You will then notice the formation of warts on the bottom of her foot. Remove them using a syringe. Help her to undergo an x-ray to determine if she is suffering from any broken bones and fix them immediately. Your next job in this cool doctor game for kid is to help her cure her wounds fast with the help of a bandage and ointment. Try to finish the task as soon as possible since other three ghouls are also waiting for their turn. Good luck, ladies!
